PageTitle: display mpls multicast-lsp statistics protocol mldp
FuncDef: The display mpls multicast-lsp statistics protocol mldp command displays forwarding plane statistics about multicast LSPs.
CLIs: display mpls multicast-lsp statistics protocol mldp
Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls multicast-lsp statistics protocol mldp
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view forwarding plane statistics about a multicast LSP, run the display mpls multicast-lsp statistics protocol mldp command on each node. Only P2MP LSPs can be used as multicast LSPs.
Precautions
On a bud node that functions as both a transit node and a leaf node on a multicast P2MP LSP, statistics contain only bud LSP information, but do not contain transit or egress LSP information.
